verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> thou <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8085>obeyeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4480>furnace,<s%> <S%H3564><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you: so shall ye <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> your God: <S%H430><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> I may <S%H6965>perform<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> I, and <S%H559>said,<s%> So be <S%H543>it,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

For <S%H3588><s%> I earnestly <S%H5749>protested<s%> <S%H5749><s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H5749>protesting,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

Yet they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but <S%H1980>walked<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> therefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them to <S%H6213>do;<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, A <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

They are turned <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H7223>forefathers,<s%> <S%H1><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1697>words;<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them: the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6565>broken<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3318>escape;<s%> <S%H4480><s%> and though they shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.

Then shall the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> unto <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> offer <S%H6999>incense:<s%> but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> save them at <S%H3467>all<s%> <S%H3467><s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> thy <S%H430>gods,<s%> O <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have ye set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to that shameful <S%H1322>thing,<s%> even <S%H4196>altars<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7440>cry<s%> or <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that they <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me <S%H1157>for<s%> their <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> hath my <S%H3039>beloved<s%> to do in mine <S%H1004>house,<s%> seeing she hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H4209>lewdness<s%> with <S%H7227>many,<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee? <S%H3588>when<s%> thou doest <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> thou <S%H5937>rejoicest.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> A <S%H7488>green<s%> olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> <S%H3303>fair,<s%> and of <S%H8389>goodly<s%> <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> with the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1999>tumult<s%> he hath <S%H3341>kindled<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and the <S%H1808>branches<s%> of it are <S%H7489>broken.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that <S%H5193>planted<s%> thee, hath <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, <S%H1588>for<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> against themselves to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> in offering <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath given me <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of it, and I <S%H3045>know<s%> it: <S%H227>then<s%> thou <S%H7200>showedst<s%> me their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

But <S%H589>I<s%> was like a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> or an <S%H441>ox<s%> that is <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter;<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they had <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, saying, Let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> with the <S%H3899>fruit<s%> thereof, and let us cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2142>remembered.<s%>

But, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that <S%H8199>judgest<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> that <S%H974>triest<s%> the <S%H3629>reins<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let me <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H4480>on<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee have I <S%H1540>revealed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that thou <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> by our hand: <S%H3027><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them: the young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by famine: <S%H7458><s%>

And there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of them: <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> even the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation.<s%>
